app.title: NeuroSuite - Neuropsychological Assessment
app.description: Clinical platform for neuropsychological testing and monitoring.

attention.name: Sustained Attention - Letter Cancellation
attention.description: Identify and select the target letter that appears on screen as quickly as possible.

verbalMemory.name: Verbal Memory - HVLT-R
verbalMemory.description: Listen to the word lists and remember as many as you can in each trial.

visualMemory.name: Visual Memory - BVMT-R
visualMemory.description: Observe the geometric figures and then draw them in the same order and position.

executive.name: Executive Functions - TMT A/B
executive.description: Connect numbers and letters in sequence as quickly as possible without making errors.

visuospatial.name: Visuospatial - Clock Drawing Test
visuospatial.description: Draw a clock showing the indicated time, including numbers and hands.

verbalMemoryDelayed.name: Verbal Memory - Delayed Recall
verbalMemoryDelayed.description: After the interval, write all the words you remember from the list presented before.

language.name: Language - Semantic Verbal Fluency
language.description: Say as many words as you can from the indicated category in 60 seconds.
